attributes.action: Give extension dates to all theory test pass certificates
attributes.additional_details: It has affected Many people due to the lockdowns , this isn’t fair on people especially people with learning Disabilty who are giving their best to pass the theory tests and now cause of the lockdowns a lot of the time has been wasted , they can not take driving lessons and their theory test expiry dates are coming closer and closer
attributes.background: Extend the theory test expiry dates
